trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Jo kinne der no foar kieze om malware, advertinsjes en advertinsjetrackers út te filterjen, wêrtroch jo mear beskerming krije wylst jo op ynternet navigearje. Jo fine dizze funksjes yn ‘Privacyfunksjes’ yn it menu Ynstellingen.
trans-unit.source: You can now choose to filter out malware, ads, and ad trackers, giving you more protection as you navigate the web. Find these features in “Privacy features” within the Settings menu.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Wannear’t jo de app foar it earst starte, stelt de app no automatysk de serverlokaasje foar dy’t it meat tichteby jo yn de buert is.
trans-unit.source: When you first launch the app, the app will now automatically suggest the server location that is closest to you.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Wy hawwe de opsjes yn it menu Ynstellingen reorganisearre om jo te helpen wichtige funksjes fan de app te finen, lykas privacyfunksjes en funksjonaliteit foar app-útslútingen.
trans-unit.source: We’ve reorganized the options in the Settings menu to help you find important features of the app, like Privacy features, as well as App exclusions functionality.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Wy hawwe ek bugfixes, oanpassingen oan de brûkersinterface en oare prestaasjesferbetteringen makke om Mozilla VPN noch better te meitsjen.
trans-unit.source: We’ve also made bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements to make Mozilla VPN even better.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Soargje derfoar dat jo de app bywurkje om it noch makliker te meitsjen om jo apparaten en jo online aktiviteiten te beskermjen!
trans-unit.source: Be sure to update the app to make it even easier to protect your devices and your activity online!

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Soargje derfoar dat jo de nijste ferzje downloade om it noch makliker te meitsjen om jo apparaten en jo online aktiviteiten te beskermjen!
trans-unit.source: Be sure to get the latest version to make it even easier to protect your devices and your activity online!

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Wy hawwe in bywurke ferzje fan Mozilla VPN útbrocht! Download dizze hjoed noch om de nijste funksjes en bugfixes te ûntfangen:
trans-unit.source: We’ve released an updated version of Mozilla VPN! Download it today to get the newest features and bug fixes:

trans-unit.target: Wy hawwe in bywurke ferzje fan Mozilla VPN útbrocht! Wurkje by nei de nijste ferzje om de nijste funksjes en bugfixes te ûntfangen:
trans-unit.source: We’ve released an updated version of Mozilla VPN! Update to the latest version to get the newest features and bug fixes:
